snippet: The ban on exports of unprocessed minerals has been criticized by miners who say a plan to build smelters in the country is not economically viable.
abstract: Indonesia, one of world's biggest producers of minerals, implements law banning export of unprocessed ore; ban has been criticized by miners who say a plan to build smelters in the country is not economically viable.
lead_paragraph: The ban on exports of unprocessed minerals has been criticized by miners who say a plan to build smelters in the country is not economically viable.

headline.main: Indonesia Announces Export Ban on Raw Ore
headline.print_headline: Confusion on Banning Ore Exports in Indonesia
